thread.title: Girish Karnad sheds serious side, pretends to be drunk
thread.title_full: Girish Karnad sheds serious side, pretends to be drunk - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Girish Karnad sheds serious side, pretends to be drunk
text:
On a rainy Wednesday evening, true blue Bengalureans got together at the ITC Windsor to celebrate the city that was. Girish Karnad, Anita Nair, Aloma Lobo, Stanley Pinto and Priya Chetty-Rajgopal, among others, attended the book launch of Paul Fernandes' Bangalore Swinging in the 70s.
There was much revelry (over wine, of course) typical of old Bengaluru. Even the habitually `serious' Girish Karnad got into the spirit and pretended to be drunk when called upon stage to formally launch the book. And just for a minute, the room went silent, thinking Karnad was indeed sloshed. Of course later they remembered he is after all an award-winning actor.
